survey_name: Workplace Digital Collaboration Tools Effectiveness Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and effectiveness with digital collaboration tools used in the workplace, to identify areas for improvement and optimize tool usage.

questions.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use for work?
questions.client_notes: This question helps identify the most commonly used tools. Ensure the 'Other' option allows for text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a MULTI_CHOICE field type with checkboxes and include an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which digital collaboration tools do you currently use for work?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools you use?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a SINGLE_CHOICE field type with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital collaboration tools you use?

questions.question_text: What is the most significant challenge you face when using these tools?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question will provide qualitative insights into user pain points.

questions.question_text: How often do you experience technical issues with these tools?
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point frequency scale to gauge reliability.
